name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel - Richmond Airport

reviews.text: Is it me or Double tree hotels have improved since ten years ago?
reviews.title: Double tree, YOU ROCK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is just very convenient, and also very comfortable. The staff is very friendly and my favorite part, THE COOKIE, warm and delicious.
reviews.title: Nice stay

likes.liked: — Kind staff, nice ammenities and extras

reviews.text: The room are just huge, with a separate living room. The beds are very comfortable with soft pillows.
reviews.title: Nice stay at Double Tree

likes.liked: — Cleanliness, on-site restaurant and close to the airport
likes.disliked: — Cigarette odor in the corridors and loud A/C

reviews.text: They have a nice bar downstairs and a restaurant next to it. The waitress was so nice, and the salmon salad was just right.
reviews.title: Very nice stay at the Double Tree

reviews.text: Whatever you do, DO NOT ORDER THE CHICKEN WINGS, there are really small and bad.
reviews.title: Great staff, great location, very nice room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although we live fairly close to the airport it was cheaper to stay the night at the Doubletree and leave our car with them than it was to drive and park at the airport.
reviews.title: Middle of the road...

likes.disliked: — Bland boring rooms and dated communal areas once you get past the lobby

reviews.text: We'd arrived around 9pm, were welcomed by gentleman at the front desk who made sure we were given the cookies, parking permit, and as a Hilton HHonors Gold member, breakfast vouchers for the following morning. Our room was on the third floor but the elevators were hellishly slow! Even with suitacases I could have probably hauled them up the stairs quicker myself. Once past the lobby the communal areas are very bland and non-descript in real need of a makeover. For some reason my preferences had magically changed to be in favour of twin beds! Don't know how it happened but we just wanted to prepare for the following morning and sleep.
reviews.title: Great night

reviews.text: The room felt rather tired, with loads of empty space on the walls, could have really done with some decorating!
reviews.title: Much better this time
Rough Night
reviews.text: Breakfast the following morning was pretty good, not spectacular but there was a chef on hand to prepare custom omelettes which my wife liked. Service was good with frequent drink top ups all round.

reviews.title: Clean rooms, friendly staff, free parking
reviews.text: We took the shuttle to the airport later in the day and it doesn't seem to run continuously. Best just to call the front desk and get the guy to come round, alternatively if you feel adventurous you could hike across the roads and car parks! It really is pretty close and the hotel is the closest the airport terminal.

Arrived on a subfreezing night in December. Called for shuttle. Very friendly desk clerk told me 5 - 10 minutes. Had to call back at the 20 minute mark. Friendly driver though. As other reviewers have stated, rooms are the old design and outdated, clean & quiet. Ordered breakfast with door hanger to be delivered between 8:30 - 8:45. Had to call down at 8:50.
reviews.title: Not punctual, but friendly.

reviews.text: Ordered cab, gave friendly front desk destination and asked to make sure driver knew where it was. Cab was waiting, but driver was clueless.
reviews.title: Would definitely stay here again if I needed a place near the airport

reviews.text: I needed a last-minute place to stay near the Richmond airport after my evening flight was delayed so much that I was going to arrive too late to pick up my rental car to get to my final destination. Fortunately, they had room and getting a reservation was no problem.
reviews.title: Not Great

reviews.text: My experience with the Doubletree was very positive. The people I spoke with at the front desk were very nice and friendly, as was the shuttle bus driver. The warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in was a nice touch.
reviews.title: Decent Hotel right by Richmond Airport

reviews.text: The room itself was larger than I'd expected and very clean. I liked that they had Neutrogena products in the bathroom, since I use them anyway.
reviews.title: noisy on weekends

reviews.text: larger comfortable rooms.. On site restaurant has breakfast buffet that is so so. Convenient to the airport
reviews.title: comfortable hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel the night before we went on our trip to Club Med in Florida with the family.
reviews.title: Good Stay at this Nice Airport Hotel

reviews.text: The front desk was nice enough to upgrade us to one-bedroom suites and gave us rooms on the same floor.
reviews.title: Aging amenities but still decent

likes.liked: — Breakfast buffet, and free warm cookies...

reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to use the outdoor pool which was very comfortable and enjoyable. They even have an outdoor volleyball court.
reviews.title: Nice Property

reviews.text: The hotel shuttle was on-time as usual. Operates every hour on the half-hour. Runs actually 24 hours a day (on demand at the wee hours of the night)
reviews.title: Convenient & comfortable

likes.disliked: — Not much else in the area

description: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Richmond Airport is across from Richmond International Airport (RIC) and offers complimentary shuttle service, parking and high speed internet access. Enjoy our fitness center, volleyball court, seasonal outdoor pool and whirlpool.
